EJS Moving to Google Code

By Ted Benson on Dec 5, 2007

The folks over at JavaScript MVC have been using EJS in their framework, and have made a lot of great chances to it, so I’m going to move it over to Google Code this week so that others can more easily track development of it and contribute changes.
